title: New: Lana Del Rey – So Legit
body:
**Lana Del Rey** dissing **Lady Gaga** for selling out… oh the irony is almost too much to take.

Anyway, I’ve got a mighty soft spot for the pouty lipped New Yorker, and this dig at Stefani is, in usual Elizabeth Grant style, ridiculously over the top and coated in a thick film of sugary jealously. Featuring lines such as “_Stefani, you suck, I know you’re selling twenty million / Wish they could have seen you when we booed you off in Williamsburg_” and “_You’re looking like a man, you’re talking like a baby / How the fuck is your song in a Coke commercial, crazy?_“, it’s no coincidence that this old demo has ‘leaked’ online ahead of **Gaga’s** new release, which is rumoured to feature **Lana Del Rey**… I guess they kissed and made up.

“Remember when the streets used to be dangerous and we were born bad” HA. Also, if you want a good laugh, check out Lady Gaga and Lana fans bickering in the Youtube comments.

excerpt.full: Lana Del Rey dissing Lady Gaga for selling out… oh the irony is almost too much to take. Anyway, I’ve got a mighty soft spot for the pouty lipped New Yorker, and this dig at Stefani is, in usual Elizabeth Grant style, ridiculously over the top and coated in a thick film of sugary jealously. \[…\]
excerpt.short: Lana Del Rey dissing Lady Gaga for selling out...
